
[dev]
sphinx >= 1.2.2, < 2
sphinx_rtd_theme >= 0.1.6, < 1
lowdown >= 0.1.0, < 1
pytest-runner >= 2.7, < 3
pytest >= 2.3.5, < 3
pytest-cov >= 2, < 3

[doc]
sphinx >= 1.2.2, < 2
sphinx_rtd_theme >= 0.1.6, < 1
lowdown >= 0.1.0, < 1

[test]
pytest-runner >= 2.7, < 3
pytest >= 2.3.5, < 3
pytest-cov >= 2, < 3
